Package Network

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • Network.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class Server which houses the implementation of the server itself

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.List<ClientHandler> clients
      a variable of type List with ClientHandlers in it to have a list of client handlers
      private java.util.List<ServerGame> games
      a variable of type List to house the Games which are catered to work on a server as well as with a list it is possible to have multiple instances of the game running
      private java.util.List<ClientHandler> queuedClientHandlers
      a variable of type List with queued ClientHandlers to have a list of client handlers who have queued for the game itself
      private java.lang.String serverName
      a variable of type String that declares the server name
      private java.net.ServerSocket serverSocket
      a variable of type ServerSocket to give server a server socket
      private java.lang.Thread thread
      a variable of type Thread to allow adding client handlers or removing them and checking if the server is still alive
